Misc.

Misc.

Harris v. Arkansas; and Trotter v. Arkansas. George Howard, Jr., for petitioner in No. 144, Misc. Petitioner pro se in No. 155, Misc. Bruce, Bennett, Attorney Genéral of Arkansas, and Jack L. Lessenberry, Chief Assistant Attorney General, for respondent.
